entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
